mapper.select: SELECT CERT_NO certNo, PERS_NM name, PERS_USERID username, PERS_PSWD password, USER_ST_CD userStCd FROM MB_MEMB_EMP WHERE PERS_USERID = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into MB_MEMB_EMP(CERT_NO certNo, PERS_NM name, PERS_USERID userId, PERS_PSWD password, INT_DT, USER_ST_CD userStCd, EMAIL email ) VALUES(MB_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{userId}, #{password}, sysdate, "50", #{email} )
